name: Maxwell The Cat Simulator
description:
Hey there! I wanted to do an early release of the game once I had the first puzzle done! I am going to be MIA for 3 or 4 days for the holidays so I at least got a quick version of the game out.

Currently there is 1 puzzle. The final game will have 3-4 including some cat friends to dance with you :)) <3 Happy holidays!

There are no in game hints for the puzzle. It is solvable in two separate ways :) 
I have done very little bug testing or optimization so I am sorry if its not working correctly <3
